name: Coffee Shop Website
desc: A responsive coffee shop website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a menu, location details, and contact information.

name: Emotion Detector
desc: Facial Emotion Recognition system built with a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) using Python and Keras.

name: Face Recognition
desc: Demonstrates the implementation of a face recognition system using Siamese networks. The system is designed to identify and verify individuals based on their facial features.

name: VNIT Survey Form
desc: A survey form created for VNIT students to gather feedback on various aspects of campus life, academics, and facilities.

name: Simon Game
desc: A Classic Simon Game, where players follow a sequence of colors that increases in complexity as the game progresses

name: Virtual Heap Management
desc: A simple heap memory manager implemented in C. It simulates a memory allocation system where memory blocks can be allocated, freed, and managed efficiently

name: Symbol Table
desc: This project is an implementation of a simple symbol table using a hash table and scope management in C.

name: AudioBook Management System
desc: Audiobook Library System designed to manage users and audiobooks. Management of audiobooks, listening progress, library management & user preferences.

name: Parser
desc: A simple parser that reads a source code file and generates an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) representation of the code structure.

name: Sequence-2-Seqeuence Model
desc: A Seq2Seq model implementation for tasks like machine translation or text summarization using TensorFlow and Keras.

name: IvLabs Website
desc: IVLabs is a student-run organization that focuses on practical learning and innovation in technology. The website showcases their projects, events, and initiatives.
